entry.title: Boho Boutique 4 Poster Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1999.00

LAST CHANCE!  ONLY ONE LEFT COCKBURN!  SPECIAL DISPLAY STOCK PRICE! 

The Boho Bed is a striking 4 poster bed crafted from a blend of Mango wood solids and mixed timber veneers of teak, mahogany and ash, adding interest and detail. Featuring a statement inlaid pattern that adds to its nomadic, world traveller appeal, this bed will transform your bedroom into a Balinese inspired retreat.

entry.title: Giselle Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1999.00 - 2299.00 (2 variants)

This French Provincial inspired bed features beautiful arches and a classic buttoned headboard with studding, surrounded by weathered, rustic timber.

entry.title: Orlando Bed - Natural
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1299.00 - 1599.00 (2 variants)

The Orlando Bed in Natural features a unique pillow-inspired headboard with rounded corners, offering superb comfort and support. Its neutral colour scheme evokes a soft and inviting aesthetic that promises style in any bedroom setting.

entry.title: Bremer Bay Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1299.00 - 1599.00 (2 variants)

Crafted from solid, reclaimed pine, the Bremer Bay Bed showcases timber trim with a tawny stain to achieve a weathered look and ivory cross design headboard and footboard.

entry.title: Willoughby Bed - Sand
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 599.00 - 999.00 (2 variants)

The Willoughby is a timeless beige fabric bed featuring a classic design characterised by sleek, clean lines for an effortlessly elegant aesthetic. Also available in Charcoal.

entry.summary:

Price: 599.00 - 999.00 (2 variants)

The Willoughby is a timeless charcoal fabric bed featuring a classic design characterised by sleek, clean lines for an effortlessly elegant aesthetic. Also available in Sand.

Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom

A testament to elegant French Provincial Design, the Charlotte Bed is a very classy choice for the bedroom, with its beautiful lines, beige buttoned headboard and timber frame.

The Picardy is an elegant French Provincial style bed exuding timeless charm, showcasing a buttoned beige linen upholstered headboard, complemented by a rustic oak bedframe.

entry.title: Alsace Bed - Rustic Oak
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1999.00 - 2299.00 (2 variants)

The Alsace is an exquisite French provincial style bed boasting a tall, arched headboard in upholstered linen, harmonizing with a rustic oak timber bedframe to exude timeless elegance.

Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom

Infuse your bedroom with opulent charm with this silver velvet bed featuring a stunning panelled headboard, inviting luxurious comfort and a striking focal point to your space.

Infuse your bedroom with opulent charm and vibrant flair with this bright blue velvet bed featuring a stunning panelled headboard, inviting luxurious comfort and a striking focal point to your space.

entry.title: Valonz Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 899.00 - 1199.00 (2 variants)

The Valonz exudes contemporary chic with its relaxed exposed seam headboard. A true blank canvas, you can keep the look neutral and minimalistic or add colourful, textured cushions.

entry.title: Colorado Bed with Two Sliding Drawers
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1899.00 - 2199.00 (2 variants)

Experience rustic elegance with the Colorado Bed, meticulously crafted from acacia wood and designed with convenient underbed drawers - adorned with country-inspired steel metal handles - for a harmonious blend of charm and functionality.

entry.title: Jasmine Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery 1
Type: Advanced
Price: 499.00 - 699.00 (3 variants)

Bring some urban chic style to your bedroom with Jasmine Bed. The neutral headboard features straight lines that give it a clean, modern look, while the velvet upholstery adds an inviting, cosy feel.

entry.title: Long Beach Elite King Headboard
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Bedroom

entry.title: Allure Bed with Drawers - Natural
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery 1
Type: Bedroom
Price: 1399.00 - 1699.00 (2 variants)

Make your bedroom truly alluring and inviting with the Allure Bed in Natural. Upholstered in a neutral fabric in a tweed-like texture, this stunning piece features a statement vertical panel headboard that oozes grandeur, and practical under-bed storage. 

Also available in Midnight.

*Price for Headboard ONLY.  See Romance Upholstered King Bed for bed price.

entry.title: Pandora Bed - King

Vendor: The Furniture Gallery

The grand, ultra-high headboard of the Pandora exudes refined class, while offering comfortable backing for reading in bed. Its elegance is further elevated by distinctive stainless steel framing and antique timber legs.
